name: quorumbet
overview:
Quorumbet is a betting platform that gives you the freedom of peer-to-peer betting on any topic. You get to create your own bet statement(s) on what you are passionate about and invite your social network (i.e. friends, family anyone you may know) to participate. When you win the bet’s pot is then split proportionately amongst all winners based on their stakes.

  • You can facilitate a bet and you get 2% of the winners’ amount
  • You can participate in a bet you have created and you win a proportional amount based on your stakes
  • You can participate in existing bets and win a proportional amount based on your stakes.

The system facilitates the rules you have outlined in the bets you create.
